descriptionHtml:
[b][u][center][color=#ff7700][size=5][/size][/color][/center][/u][/b][center][/center][center][/center][center]﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿[b][u][color=#ff7700][size=5]Lilith - RaceMenu Preset -[/size][/color][/u][/b]﻿[b][u]

﻿[img]https://i.cubeupload.com/wuwu0q.png[/img]﻿﻿﻿[/u][/b]


[b][color=#ff7700][size=3]----IT'S HIGHLY RECOMMENDED TO VIEW THIS PAGE WITH THE NEXUS REDESIGN, TO VIEW CORRECTLY THE IMAGES----[/size][/color][/b]



[font=Trebuchet MS][/font][size=3]Hi everybody, ﻿this is my first Racemenu preset. 
It's my personal character. And as I already completed the game, i share to all you.
Special Thanks to [url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/16238684]derigt[/url][b] [/b]an his mod[b] [/b][url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77368/]-Erika Preset for Racemenu- [/url]﻿
Because It's the base on which I started to work on this preset.


[size=3]And last but not least, English is not my main lenguaje so you can find some inconsistencies.[/size]
[/size][/center]



[center]﻿[/center][center][color=#ff7700][size=5]--REQUIRED--[/size][/color]

[color=#efefef][size=3](Don't forget to check the mods required to run these)[/size][/color]



[size=4][color=#6fa8dc][b]-[/b][url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?tab=description]FAIR SKIN COMPLEXION[/url][b]﻿-[/b][/color][/size]

[size=4]
[b][color=#6fa8dc]-[/color][/b][url=https://www.google.com]ADORABLE FACE V1.21[/url]﻿﻿﻿[b][color=#6fa8dc]-[/color][/b]
[/size][size=4][url=https://www.google.com/][/url][/size]
[size=2]It's not on nexus, but google it's your friend.
It's very very easy to find.
And, no... i don't have tested running whitout this mod.[/size]
[size=4][url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]

-BROWS[/url]﻿﻿[color=#6fa8dc][b]-[/b][/color][/size]
[size=4][url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70363/]

-KS HAIRDOS - HDT PHYSICS[/url]﻿[color=#9fc5e8][b]-[/b][/color][/size]

[size=2]Don't forget to download the HDT BBP Fix, or your butt will start to bounce randomly.[/size]
[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]


[size=4]-THE EYES OF BEAUTY-[/size]



[/url][size=4][b][color=#6fa8dc]-[/color][/b][url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/]RACEMENU[/url]﻿﻿[/size][color=#6fa8dc][size=4]-[/size]







[/color][color=#ff7700][size=5]--HIGHLY RECOMMENDED--

[/size][/color]
[size=4][url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71063/]-FACELIGHT PLUS-[/url]﻿﻿


[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84714]-BETTER LIGHTING FOR FACELIGHT AND FACELIGHT PLUS-

[/url]﻿
[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87900][/url][url=http://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87900/]-LILITH -BODYSLIDE PRESET- CBBE-[/url]﻿﻿﻿﻿﻿
[/size][/center]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/mQ6A7X4.png[/img]
[center][color=#ff7700][size=5][u][b]


--INSTALL--

[/b][/u][/size][/color][/center][center]﻿
[u][b][color=#ff7700][size=4]MANUAL[/size][/color][/b][/u]

[size=3]Drop the file into you Skyrim folder  Data/SKSE/Plugins/Chargen/Presets[/size]


[u][b][color=#ff7700][size=4]USING NMM[/size][/color][/b]
[/u]
[size=3]Just click and relax



[/size]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/4l3oAUr.png[/img]﻿


[b][u][size=5][color=#ff7700]--MODS USED IN SCREENSHOTS--[/color][/size][/u][/b]





[b][size=3]Kinoko pose by cryptoporus

Bijin Warmaidens by rxkx22
[/size][/b][b][size=3]
[/size]

by Mangaclub

[/size][/b][size=3][b]Enhanced Lights and FX by anamorfus

Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide HDT by ChronoTrigger77[/b][/size][b][size=3]

IMAGINATOR - Visual Control Device for Skyrim by [b]MyGoodEye and Gopher - with help from Vivanto and Deapri[/b] 

DYNAVISION - Dynamic Depth of Field by [b]Gopher and MyGoodEye[/b] [/size][/b][b][size=3]

[/size]

[/size]

[b]

[/size][/size]
[/b]
